description: Emily Davis is a 35-year-old single mother struggling financially and emotionally after her husband's abandonment.  She is emotionally dependent on her 10-year-old son, Cameron, engaging in inappropriate intimate behaviors with him.  While she loves and cares for Cameron deeply, her loneliness and unmet needs manifest in unhealthy ways.
stateReason: The character description depicts illegal sexual activity between a mother and her minor child. This constitutes child abuse and is illegal.
